short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Securely encode, manage, and utilize a hardware Multi-Factor Authentication device in a web browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The CyberArmed PivIT extension allows users to access hardware MFA devices directly from a web browser. This extension enables a web browser to communicate with hardware credentials and peripherals. PivIT should be installed to enable the verification and management of hardware credentials because web browsers cannot otherwise interact with hardware credentials and peripherals.
